title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Collaborative Learning-Based Mathematics Proficiency Program for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners explain the process of solving complex mathematical problems through role division within collaborative learning groups.
Learners propose creative problem-solving solutions based on interactions with peers possessing diverse perspectives and expertise.
Learners produce a mathematics application case report reflecting collaborative learning experiences through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
